price: 64. Dis : « Est-ce un autre qu’Allah que vous m’ordonnerez d’adorer, ô ignorants ? »
arabic: قُلۡ أَفَغَيۡرَ ٱللَّهِ تَأۡمُرُوٓنِّيٓ أَعۡبُدُ أَيُّهَا ٱلۡجَٰهِلُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: qul afaghayra al-lahi tamurūnnī aʿbudu ayyuhā al-jāhilūna
